member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS
member.summary: Indicates ambient properties supplied by the container. It is used in the dwAmbientFlags member of the structure.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_SHOWHATCHING
member.summary: Specifies the ShowHatching ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -712.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_SHOWGRABHANDLES
member.summary: Specifies the ShowGrabHandles ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -711.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_USERMODE
member.summary: Specifies the UserMode ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -709.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_DISPLAYASDEFAULT
member.summary: Specifies the DisplayAsDefault ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -713.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_UIDEAD
member.summary: Specifies the UIDead ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -710.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_AUTOCLIP
member.summary: Specifies the AutoClip ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -715.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_MESSAGEREFLECT
member.summary: Specifies the MessageReflect ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -706.

member.name: QACONTAINERFLAGS.QACONTAINER_SUPPORTSMNEMONICS
member.summary: Specifies the SupportsMnemonics ambient property, which has a standard ambient DISPID of -714.
